about_the_game:
🍸 Welcome to the Hottest Bar in Town! 🍸
Sex Bar Simulator: where the drinks are as hot as the customers. Step into a world of sultry bartending, where gorgeous girls line up for sizzling drinks and unforgettable moments. Ready to shake, charm, and serve your way to the top?

🍹 Your Bar, Your Rules 🍹
It's your den of delight, where stunning ladies want more than just a drink – they want an experience. Listen close, mix to their desires, and dazzle them with your shaking skills. Don't forget the ice to keep things chill and the decorations for that extra wow factor. Keep the mood up and watch your artistry score rise. Your mission: mix, serve, and leave an impression they won't forget.

🥂 FEATURES 🥂


  • 🍸 Shake It Up: Craft dreamy cocktails that even fantasies envy! Follow enticing recipes, pick the right ingredients, and concoct drinks that are all about allure and flavor.

  • 🕺 Daring Moves: Show off with daring bottle flips and catches! Keep the energy high and the crowd mesmerized as you add your flair to the bar.

  • ❄️ Ice, Ice, Baby: Not all drinks like it hot. Use ice cubes to cool things down, and serve drinks that send shivers down spines.

  • 🌟Vibe Matters: More than mixology, it's about the ambiance. Serve with style, complete orders swiftly, and pull off jaw-dropping stunts to keep those vibes soaring.

  • 🎨 Your Signature Touch: Looks matter! Choose from a range of decorations to add that final, irresistible touch to your drinks. Impress through presentation and score big points.

  • 🥂 Stir Desires: Your mission? Mix not just cocktails but desire. Create the most tempting blends that leave them wanting more than just a sip.



Enter the intoxicating world of Sex Bar Simulator. Drinks, charm, and a dash of daring await you. Can you take the heat? Dive into this seductive journey and start your wild bartending adventure now!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: Sex Bar Simulator 🍸🔞

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Stunning ladies want more than just a drink – they want an experience. Listen close, mix to their desires, and dazzle them with your shaking skills to get an intimate feedback from your beautiful clients.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Hungarian, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
